author: Yulia Poterianko
title: Is it possible to discharge the phone battery to zero - what are the consequences
text: Currency Why you shouldn't drain your phone battery to zero: reasons that will scare you During power outages, which have become more frequent in Ukraine due to the barbaric shelling by the Russian occupiers, it is sometimes necessary to discharge gadget batteries to zero. But how safe is it to do this with smartphones? There is a widespread belief that a complete discharge negatively affects the state of the phone's battery and can eventually damage it. NV [found out](https://techno.nv.ua/ukr/gadgets/5-prichin-nikoli-ne-rozryadzhati-batareyu-svogo-smartfona-do-nulya-50361063.html) whether this is true. Almost all modern smartphones have non-removable batteries, so replacing a damaged part is not as easy as we would like – you have to go to a service and pay a lot of money. Sometimes it is comparable to the cost of a new device. That's why experts advise taking care of the battery from the moment you buy the device. Here are five reasons why such care begins with preventing its complete discharge. Technical limitations of lithium-ion batteries The vast majority of batteries in modern smartphones are made using lithium-ion technology. They work best when the charge level ranges from 20% to 80%. Frequent full discharge overloads the battery and negatively affects its capacity and charge efficiency. Battery performance Optimal smartphone performance with adequate functioning of all its systems and applications can only be ensured with a sufficient level of charge. If your smartphone is discharged to less than 15%, it goes into power-saving mode and stops some processes, and this can lead to disruptions in its normal operation. And also to malfunctions in the settings. However, sometimes it happens that you can't charge your phone in time. In this case, do not violate the power saving mode and use the almost discharged gadget very carefully. Data loss and corruption A smartphone battery that is too low can lead to another unpleasant consequence – loss or damage to your data. For example, a file or document you were working on when the device was turned off will not be saved. Similarly, such an incident can lead to a malfunction of the program you were using. Emergencies Having a charged phone is also a safety factor during long outages. A completely discharged gadget will not do you any good if you find yourself in a dangerous situation or need help. Therefore, if you don't know when the power will be restored, try to save your charge as much as possible. Unnecessary recharge cycles Any battery is not designed to last forever – it has a certain number of charging cycles, after which it begins to degrade. Regular discharge to zero accelerates this process. Thus, you significantly bring the final wear of the battery closer Subscribe to the OBOZ.UA channels on [Telegram](https://t.me/uaobozrevatel) and [Viber](https://invite.viber.com/?g2=AQA7vCW3MX33iE9EYhmE3GhB43vyI%2B%2BnsqzemGPFrFGfl8TEL3d6MiPUriT1T%2FJF) to keep up with the latest developments.

author: @malphilian
title: Muchos usuarios de Xbox muestran su enfado ante la salida de Forza Horizon 5 en PS5
text:
Ayer mismo, Xbox lanzaba un bombazo a las redes que supuso un fuerte golpetazo en la gran mesa del mundo de los videojuegos: Forza Horizon 5 llegará a PS5 en algún punto por confirmar de primavera de este mismo año 2025. Algo que viene a confirmar aquellos rumores de hace unos meses en los que se decía que la división gaming de Microsoft dejaría de poner barreras frente a sus exclusividades. Sin embargo, parece que no todo el mundo se está tomando demasiado bien estas noticias.
La cosa es que, si accedes a cualquier post de Twitter publicado por Xbox desde que la compañía llevase a cabo el anuncio, probablemente te encuentres con que todas las respuestas a sus publicaciones tienen que ver con una turba de usuarios enfadados por la reciente decisión que ha tomado la compañía de hacer que uno de sus grandes exclusivos deje de serlo dentro de poco. Os dejo con algunos ejemplos a continuación.
Si cogemos como ejemplo una reciente publicación donde Xbox anunciaba una nueva promoción de ofertas relacionada con los juegos indie más destacados del pasado año 2024, veremos que el 95% de las respuestas tienen que ver con el hecho de que Forza Horizon 5 saldrá en PS5 pronto. Os dejo con algunas de las respuestas más destacadas a continuación:
Si queréis mi opinión sincera, el único punto por el que pienso que la gente se podría medio-enfadar tiene que ver con que el discurso de Phil Spencer al principio de esta generación era muy diferente, asegurando que los exclusivos de la compañía se corresponderían como uno de los grandes atractivos a la hora de comprar una Xbox Series X/S. Cosa que parece que no será así en la segunda mitad de vida de la consola.
Igualmente, no puedo evitar ver todo esto, una vez más, como una guerra entre gente que siente más apego por una caja con lucecitas que otra, pero me sorprende que este conflicto siga siendo tan intenso en pleno año 2024. ¿Qué pensáis vosotros y vosotras de todo esto y de la nueva estrategia de Xbox? Os leo en los comentarios.
CONTENIDO RELACIONADO
El exitoso juego de carreras de Xbox podría aterrizar más pronto que tarde en PS5
Todos los rumores apuntan a que el juego de PlayGround Games llegará pronto a la consola de Sony
Se trata de una colaboración de Xbox y la cadena de pollo americana
La última entrega de la franquicia se puede conseguir realmente barata gracias a esta nueva rebaja
Playground Games sigue trabajando duramente en los nuevos contenidos que llegarán a este genial título
El exclusivo de Microsoft cuenta actualmente con una jugosa oferta en Amazon

author: 小浪财讯
title: 中证500成长ETF（159606）跌0.97%，半日成交额1046.43万元|中证500_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，中证500成长ETF（159606）跌0.97%，报0.915元，成交额1046.43万元。中证500成长ETF（159606）重仓股方面， 赤峰黄金 截止午盘跌1.95%， 九号公司 涨0.28%， 水晶光电 跌0.76%， 胜宏科技 跌0.43%， 西部矿业 跌1.26%， 东阿阿胶 跌0.32%， 恺英网络 涨0.53%， 晶晨股份 涨0.31%， 神州泰岳 跌0.63%， 宏发股份 跌2.28%。
中证500成长ETF（159606）业绩比较基准为中证500质量成长指数收益率，管理人为易方达基金管理有限公司，基金经理为伍臣东，成立（2021-12-17）以来回报为-7.54%，近一个月回报为3.67%。
风险提示：市场有风险，投资需谨慎。本文为AI大模型自动发布，任何在本文出现的信息（包括但不限于个股、评论、预测、图表、指标、理论、任何形式的表述等）均只作为参考，不构成个人投资建议。

author: Anahita Mukherji
title: What 'childless cat lady' remark tells us about America's values - Times of India
text: The world, both online and offline, has long been dominated by cats. JD Vance made the mistake of messing with them. His repulsive “childless cat lady comments,” saw him scratched, mauled, clawed and meowed at. Not surprisingly, a clarification for his sexist, misogynist and deeply patriarchal comments was directed at cats, not women. “I’ve got nothing against cats,” he said.Instead of attacking JD Vance, Kamala Harris’ presidential campaign chose simply to quote him, setting the internet on fire with a host of explosive memes, editorials and videos, as cat lovers, childless women and Taylor Swift fans helped unravel the hollowness of JD Vance’s family values.In a Fox News interview a few years ago, Vance had said, “We’re effectively run in this country—via the Democrats, via our corporate oligarchs—by a bunch of childless cat ladies who are miserable at their own lives and the choices that they’ve made, and so they want to make the rest of the country miserable, too. If you look at Kamala Harris, Pete Buttigieg, AOC, the entire future of the Democrats is controlled by people without children.” https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z5fCJqFywCQFamily mattersHate-mongering, by its very definition, does not lend itself to logic or fact-checking, a point proved by Vance. Besides the obvious fact that men judging women on their reproductive choices or using childlessness as an insult is vile and repugnant, the people he chose to attack include devoted parents. Harris has helped raise her husband Doug Emhoff’s children from his first marriage. “How can you be childless when you have cutie pie kids like Cole and I?” Harris’s step-daughter Ella asked in an Instagram post.Emhoff’s former wife Kersten has also strongly defended Harris, and praised her for being a loving, nurturing and fiercely protective co-parent who is always present.In keeping with the Republican Party’s obsession with women’s reproductive rights, Vance’s childless cat lady slur was aimed at women in politics, and not men. America’s first president George Washington did not have biological children, but was a parent to his stepchildren, much like Harris. 112369534Inexplicably, the “childless cat lady” slur was followed by an attack on US Secretary of Transportation Pete Buttigieg, a gay man raising twins with his husband Chasten. Buttigeig told CNN that Vance’s comments came at a time when he and Chasten had been through a fairly heartbreaking setback in their adoption journey. “He couldn’t have known that, but maybe that’s why you shouldn’t be talking about other people’s children,” Buttigeig added.Defending her husband, Usha Vance said what he was trying to say was that it was really hard being a parent in America, and sometimes the country’s policies were designed to make it even harder. If that’s what she understood from her husband’s comments on childless cat ladies, her translation app may have a bug in it.This is not the first time that JD Vance has attacked the childless. He has called for higher taxes from those without children, and greater voting rights for those with children, policies that can best be described as unhinged. Vance himself grew up in a dysfunctional family, with a father who put him up for adoption at six and a mother who was a drug addict, married several times, dragged him from home to home, and once threatened to crash a car in which she was driving him. And yet, he believes that biological parents have a greater stake in the future of America, however dysfunctional their homes are, compared to those who provide a happy home for children who don’t carry their DNA. Vance’s own life contradicts his ideology, exposing the sheer hypocrisy of his family values. medium112369932Vance is supporting a presidential candidate accused of sexually assaulting women, cheating on his wives and making lewd comments about his daughter is further proof of the emptiness of conservative America’s belief in family.Instead of arguing with Vance’s absurd statements, the Kamala Harris campaign, in a stroke of sheer genius, dug out a video of his vitriolic childless cat lady speech, galvanising support for Harris, giving her campaign the perfect rallying cry. After all, nearly 22 million US women between 20 and 39 do not have children. Cat ladies have had Zoom calls to raise money for the Kamala Harris campaign. 'Childless Cat Ladies for Harris 2024' is a slogan that can be found on a range of merchandise from T-shirts to bumper stickers. Cat ladies are reminding Vance that they plan to vote in the American election. And they won’t be voting for him.Vance may find his comments hard to walk back on, given that he has a history of using “cat-lady” as an insult. He once tweeted against Nobel Prize winning economist Paul Krugman, calling him a weird cat lady. The word “weird” is now being used as the Harris campaign’s adjective of choice to describe both Vance and Trump, an adjective the two men will have a hard time shaking off.

author: Chandrajit Mitra
title: Bharat Bandh Today, Farmers' Delhi March On But Talks To Continue
text: Unauthorized gatherings are banned in Noida and other parts of Gautam Buddh Nagar district in view of the 'Bharat Bandh' called by the Samyukt Kisan Morcha, a major farmers' organization involved in the 2020-21 farmers' protest, and Central Trade Unions. These organisations are not part of the 'Delhi Chalo' march, but broadly, their demands are the same. The organisations have called on farmers to suspend all agricultural work between 6 am-4 pm and stage road blockades across the country. Senior leaders of nine Central Trade Unions will hold a joint protest at Jantar Mantar over 21 demands, including a law guaranteeing minimum support price (MSP) for crops, minimum pension, and minimum wage. Haryana Roadways employees have backed the bandh call and all toll booths will remain free for three hours as part of the strike. Most offices and banks are expected to stay open. The farmers-police standoff continues at the Punjab-Haryana border with the farmers asserting they will continue with their march to Delhi. Thousands of them - with ration and diesel expected to last for months - began their march on Tuesday, demanding a law on MSP, farm law waiver, and solutions to other issues. The third round of talks in Chandigarh was held after they faced tear gas and water cannons used by cops. Two Union Ministers - Arjun Munda and Piyush Goyal - and Punjab Chief Minister Bhagwant Mann attended the meeting. Following the meeting, Arjun Munda, Union Minister of State for Agriculture and Farmers' Welfare, told reporters the issues will be discussed in detail at the 6 pm meeting on Sunday, during which the two sides will try to find a solution. Bhagwant Mann said they had a very positive conversation and a consensus was reached on several issues. The farmers have assured they would maintain peace during their protest, he said, while accusing the Haryana government of sending their cops into Punjab during the standoff. The farmers say they will continue their march to Delhi and that no conclusion can be drawn since the talks are still on. They also took up the issues of police action on them and their social media pages were taken down. The farmers said the government has sought further discussion on issues like the MSP and farm loan waiver, but discussions must also lead to timely solutions. "We said that we should not just keep discussing the issues, we should also find solutions. They said they need time," said Sarwan Pandher, a farmer leader.

organizations.name: state for agriculture and farmers' welfare

author: Lusa
title: Fogo em Montemor-o-Novo dado como dominado
text:
A fonte do Comando Sub-Regional de Emergência e Proteção Civil do Alentejo Central indicou à agência Lusa que os bombeiros estão agora a proceder a operações de rescaldo e consolidação em todo o perímetro do fogo.
Às 18h20, adiantou a mesma fonte, estavam envolvidos no combate ao fogo 124 operacionais, apoiados por 36 veículos e dois meios aéreos.
Este incêndio, para o qual foi dado o alerta às 15h10, deflagrou numa área de mato, pasto e montado, na Herdade Terra de Freira, na freguesia de São Cristóvão, concelho de Montemor-o-Novo.
Leia Também: Fogo em Montemor-o-Novo combatido por 117 operacionais e 4 meios aéreos
